hero.title: Tegura Ejo Hazaza Hawe: Menya Ubuhanga bwo Gutegura Ikawa
hero.subtitle: Kuva ku kinyampeke kugera ku gikombe, no kuva mu mahugurwa kugera ku kazi. Injira mu kigo cya mbere cy'amahugurwa mu Rwanda kugira ngo ubone ubumenyi bw'isi mu byo gutegura ikawa no gushyigikirwa mu mwuga ukeneye kugira ngo ukore neza.

benefits.title: Kuki wahitamo ikigo cy'amahugurwa cya Usafi Barista?
benefits.subtitle: Ntabwo dutanga impamyabumenyi gusa; dutanga inzira igana ku mwuga.

item1.title: Integanyanyigisho yuzuye
item1.description: Yigire ku mpuguke mu nganda nka Sandrine Gasarasi na Ishimwe Ebenezer. Integanyanyigisho yacu ikubiyemo byose kuva kuri Espresso & Milk kugeza ku micungire y'ubucuruzi bwa Coffee Shop, bituma uba witeguye ku isoko.

item2.title: Uburyo bwo kwiga bworoshye
item2.description: Yiga ku masezerano yawe. Hitamo gahunda yacu ya Onsite muri Kimironko ku bumenyi ngiro, cyangwa gahunda yacu ya E-Learning kugira ngo wige inyigisho aho ariho hose ku muvuduko wawe.

item3.title: Gushyigikira mu Mwuga Nyabyo
item3.description: Ntabwo twigisha gusa; turahuza. Bona uburyo bwihariye bwo kwimenyereza umwuga muri hoteli na café zikomeye mu gihugu, amakuru y'akazi binyuze mu muryango va Usafi, no kwitegura ibazwa ry'akazi ry'umwuga.

about.title: Amakuru y'ikigo cy'amahugurwa cya Usafi Barista

hero.title: Guteza imbere ubuziranenge bw'ikawa mu Rwanda.
hero.description: Iherereye mu mutima v'Kimironko, ikigo cy'amahugurwa cya Usafi Barista ni ikirenze ishuri gusa; ni irembo rigana ku mirimo mu rwego r'amahoteli. Duhura icyuho kiri hagati va vubushake n'umwuga, duha ababa barista b'ejo hazaza ubumenyi ngiro n'ubumenyi bw'ubucuruzi bukenewe kugira ngo batsinde mu isi v'ikawa.

mission.title: Intego yacu
mission.description: Gushoboza abantu kubona ubumenyi bw'isi mu byo gutegura ikawa n'ubumenyi bw'ubucuruzi bufatika, tubahuza n'akazi karambye n'amahirwe y'ubwisungane mu rwego r'ikawa ruri kwaguka.

vision.title: Icyerekezo cyacu
vision.description: Kuba ahantu ha mbere hatoranywa mu kwigisha iby'ikawa mu Rwanda, tuzamura urwego rwa serivisi n'ubuziranenge bw'ikawa mu akarere kose.

director.name: Sandrine Gasarasi
director.description: Nka moteri itwara Usafi, Sandrine ahagarariye ubwitange ku buziranenge n'intsinzi y'abanyeshuri. Ayobowe na we, iki kigo ntabwo cyibanda gusa ku gutegura ikawa nziza ahubwo no kubaka imico n'imikorere bya barista w'umwuga.

mentorship.title: Ubuyobozi bw'impuguke
mentorship.description: Itsinda ryacu ry'abatoza, riyobowe n'abanyamwuga bafite inararibonye nka Ishimwe Ebenezer, ryazanye amateka y'imyaka myinshi mu nganda mu ishuri. Ntabwo bigisha invigisho gusa; basangira ubumenyi nyabyo, tekinike, n'ibanga ry'umwuga utashobora kubona mu bitabo.

represent.title: Icyo duhagarariye
represent.description: "Usafi" bishaka kuvuga isuku, ubuziranenge n'ubuhanga. Duhagarariye kizere gishya cya barista bamenya ko ikawa ari igihangano. Kuva ku isuku n'umutekano kugeza kuri latte art yateye imbere, abanyeshuri bacu barangiza biteguye gukora muri café, hoteli na restaurant zikomeye.

cta.title: Witeguye kwinjira mu muryango wa Usafi?

courses.title: Amasomo y'Abanyamwuga ba Barista
courses.subtitle: Hitamo inzira yo kwiga ijyanye n'uburyo ubayeho n'intego zawe mu mwuga.

onsite.title: Amahugurwa kuri Site
onsite.description: Nziza ku banyeshuri bashaka imyitozo ihambaye, ifatika bakoresha ibikoresho by'abanyamwuga.
features: Gukoresha mu buryo butaziguye imashini za Espresso n'izisya ikawa z'ubucuruzi
Guhora uhabwa amakuru ku buryo ukora Latte Art

online.title: E-Learning
online.description: Nziza ku banyeshuri bafite gahunda nyinshi cyangwa ababa kure ya Kigali.
features: Kureba amasomo kuri videwo n'ibibazo by'isuzuma
Amasomo aboneka muri PDF washyira kuri mudasobwa yawe

curriculum.title: Incamake y'Integanyanyigisho yuzuye
curriculum.description: Twaba wiga Online cyangwa Onsite, integanyanyigisho yacu ikubiyemo inkingi za mwamba mu nganda z'ikawa.

m1.title: Intangiriro ku Ikawa
m1.description: Amateka y'ikawa, ubwoko bwihariye (Arabica vs. Robusta), n'uburyo bwo kuyitunganya.

m2.title: Iby'ibanze kuri Barista n'Ibikoresho
m2.description: Gusobanukirwa imashini va espresso, gufata neza imashini isya, na tekinike zo gushyira ikawa mu gikoresho.

m3.title: Ubumenyi bwa Espresso n'Amata
m3.description: Gutegura neza espresso (extraction) no kumenya uburyo bwo gutogosa amata (micro-foam).

m4.title: Latte Art
m4.description: Tekinike zo gushushanya imitima, rosettas, na tulips mu kawa.

m5.title: Isuku no Kwitaho
m5.description: Amategeko yo gufata neza imashini n'ubuziranenge bw'isuku aho ukorera.

m6.title: Serivisi ku Bakiriya
m6.description: Kubaka ubudahemuka bw'abakiriya, ibimenyetso by'umubiri, no guhuza serivisi n'abakiriya.

m7.title: Bonus: Ubucuruzi bwa Coffee Shop
m7.description: Gutegura ubucuruzi, kugena ibiciro, kwamamaza, n'inama zo gutangira.

notes.title: Notes z'Abanyeshuri
notes.description: Abanyeshuri bose bahabwa notes muri PDF zikubiyemo Barista Basics, Serivisi ku Bakiriya, Isuku n'Umutekano, n'Inama z'Ubucuruzi.

cert.title: Impamyabumenyi Yemewe
cert.description: Iyo urangije neza amasomo (ukatsinda n'isuzuma ryafashwe), uhabwa impamyabumenyi y'uko urangije amasomo ivuye muri Usafi Barista Training Center.

cta.title: Witeguye Gutangira Gutegura Ikawa?
cta.description: Imyanya ikunze kuzura vuba muri gahunda y'ahitwa Kimironko. Fata umwanya wawe uyu munsi cyangwa utangire kwiga online vuba.
cta.questions: Ufite ibibazo ku buryo bwo kwishyura?

contact.title: Twandikire
contact.subtitle: Twishimiye kukwumva
contact.description: Twaba ufite ibibazo ku masomo yacu, ukeneye ubufasha mu gusaba kwiga, cyangwa ushaka gusura iki kigo, itsinda ryacu rirahari kugira ngo rikuvure.

options.consultation: Kugisha inama ku bufasha ku bafite ubumuga

careerSupport.title: Zamura Umwuga Wawe
careerSupport.subtitle: Kure y'Impamyabumenyi: Inzira Yawe Digana ku Ntsinzi y'Umwuga
careerSupport.description: Muri Usafi Barista Training Center, ubwitange bwacu kuri wowe ntibushirira aho usoje amasomo yawe. Dutanga uburyo bukomeye bwo kugushyigikira bwagenewe kugufasha kuva mu mahugurwa ukajya mu kazi cyangwa mu kwihangira imirimo.

internship.title: Boneramo Inararibonye y'Akazi (Internship)
internship.description: Amahugurwa y'ubumenvingiro azuzuzwa n'inararibonye nyayo y'akazi. Gahunda yacu igushyira mu mibereho y'akazi aho ushobora gukoresha ubumenyi bwawe ukubaka n'umuyoboro w'abandi banyamwuga.

requirements.title: Ibisabwa
list: Kurangiza neza Integanyanyigisho y'Ibanze ya Barista.
Kwitabira neza n'uburyo ukora mu gihe cy'amahugurwa.

partnerships.title: Ubufatanye
partnerships.description: Usafi Barista Training Center ifitanye ubufatanye n'ama café, hoteli, n'amatsinda y'amahoteli akomeye muri Kigali kugira ngo abone amahirwe meza yo kwimenyereza akazi.

howToApply.title: Uburyo bwo Gusaba
howToApply.description: Imyanya yo kwimenyereza akazi ifite ipiganwa ryinshi. Abanyeshuri bagomba kuzuza ifishi yo gusaba y'imbere bakitabira n'ikiganiro cyo kwitoza kugira ngo bemererwe.

cv.title: Kwandika CV n'Ibyashyizweho
cv.description: Habwa inama zihariye ku gutegura CV ishimishije ijyanye n'urwego ry'amahoteli. Dutanga kandi amabaruwa y'ishimwe ku banyeshuri barangije neza kurusha abandi.

alerts.title: Imiyoboro y'Amakuru y'Akazi
alerts.description: Bona amahirwe binyuze mu muyoboro wacu wihariye n'amatsinda ya WhatsApp ya Usafi Community. Yiga gukoresha LinkedIn n'imbuga zishaka akazi k'amahoteli.

interview.title: Kwitegura Ikiganiro (Interview)
interview.description: Yiga tekinike zo gushakashaka, uko wambara neza (Uko Wambara), n'itumanaho ritarimo amagambo. Reba videwo z'ingero z'ibiganiro kugira ngo utegure intsinzi yawe.

business.title: Ubucuruzi bwa Coffee Shop
business.description: Ku banyeshuri bifuza kugira ubucuruzi bwabo, aya masomo atanga ubumenyi bw'ibanze bwo guhindura icyerekezo cyawe impamo.

pricing.title: Ibiciro & Menu
pricing.description: Kugena ibiciro byiza no gutegura menu.

certificates.title: Impamyabumenyi Zanjye
certificates.subtitle: Reba kandi ubashe kumanura impamyabumenyi watsindiye.

empty.title: Nta mpamyabumenyi yabonetse
empty.description: Komeza ukore udushya kugira ngo ubone impamyabumenyi itaha ivuye muri Usafi!

inclusion.title: Amahugurwa Afungure, Imyuga Igarije Bose
inclusion.subtitle: Ubwitange mu Kwisungana no Guhuza
inclusion.description: Usafi Barista Training Center yemera ko ubushake bwo gutegura ikawa butagira imipaka. Twiyemeje gutanga ahantu haboneye ho kwigira no guhuza integanyanyigisho yacu kugira ngo twizere ko bose bashobora kubona ubumenyi n'intsinzi, harimo n'abafite ubumuga.

hearing.title: Ku Banyeshuri Badashobora Kumva no Kuvuga
list: Kwigisha binyuze mu kureba: Kwibanda cyane ku bimenyetso bigaragara, uburyo bwanditse bugaragaza intambwe ku yindi, n'ibishushanyo bisobanutse mu masomo ngiro.
Ibikoresho by'itumanaho: Imbonerahamwe (whiteboards), tabuleti (digital tablets), n'itumanaho ryo kwandika kugira ngo uhite ubaza cyangwa usubize.
Gushyigikirwa n'Abandi: Gufatanya n'abanyeshuri bumva kugira ngo bakore neza nk'itsinda.

mobility.title: Ku Bafite Ikibazo cy'Ingendo n'Imbaraga z'Umubiri
list: Isuzumwa ry'Imikorere: Inama ku bikoresho n'uburyo bwo guhindura aho ukorera (urugero: ameza magufi).
Umutekano Mbere na Mbere: Gufashwa imbere yo gukoresha ibintu biremereye cyangwa gufata neza imashini.

service.title: Amahugurwa kuri Serivisi Igarije Bose
service.description: Igice cy'ingenzi cy'amahugurwa yacu ni ukwizera ko abarangije bose bashobora guha serivisi nziza buri mukiriya.

ordering.title: Kwitaba Umukiriya mu buryo bugaragara
ordering.description: Amahugurwa kuri gukoresha za screens cyangwa impapuro zanditseho mu kwakira komande z'abakiriya badashobora kumva cyangwa kuvuga.

etiquette.title: Imyitwarire muri Serivisi
etiquette.description: Kwigisha uburyo bwo gusabana n'itumanaho rirangwa n'ubwubahane mu guha serivisi abantu bafite ubumuga butandukanye.

awareness.title: Gusobanukirwa n'Uburyo bwo Kugera Ahantu Horoheye Bose
awareness.description: Gusobanukirwa n'uburyo café iteye, imyanya yo kwicaramo, n'ibikenewe mu bwiherero kugira ngo byoroheye bose.

consultation.title: Kuganira ku Byo Ukeneye
consultation.description: Turashishikariza abanyeshuri bifuza kwiga gushyiraho igihe cyo kuganira n'Umuyobozi wacu, Sandrine Gasarasi, mbere yo gusaba kwiga. Ibi bituma dusobanukirwa ibyo ukeneye by'umwihariko tukemeza uko twahindura aho ukorera kugira ngo utsinde.

enrollment.title: Saba kwiga ubu: Fata Umwanya Wawe
enrollment.subtitle: Injira mu kigo cya Usafi Barista Training Center
enrollment.description: Fungura konti yawe nka munyeshuri wuzuze ubusabe bwawe. Nyuma yo kubyohereza, ubusabe bwawe buzasuzumwa kugira ngo bwemezwe.

fullName.label: Amazina Yuzuye
fullName.placeholder: Uko agomba kugaragara ku mpamyabumenyi yawe

password.label: Gena Ijambo ry'Ibanga
password.hint: Uzajya ukoresha iri jambo ry'ibanga winjira ahabigenewe abanyeshuri.

errors.email_in_use: Iyi email yaramaze kwiyandikisha. Ongera winjire ukoresheje iyo email.
errors.weak_password: Ijambo ry'ibanga rigomba kugira byibura inyuguti 6.

payment.title: Ibyerekeye Kwishyura & Amategeko v'Imari
payment.description: Ubusabe bwemezwa iyo wishyuye. Tworohereza abantu kwishyura binyuze muri aya mayira:

momo.title: Mobile Money
momo.description: Amakuru ayamamazwa iyo umaze kuzuza ifishi.

bank.title: Kuri Banki
bank.description: Amakuru ya banki ayamamazwa iyo umaze kuzuza ifishi.

flexibility.title: Uburyo bwo Kwishyura Bworoshye
flexibility.description: Twemerera abanyeshuri kwishyura amafaranga y'ishuri mu bice, nk'uko amasezerano yacu ameze. Amakuru arambye azandikwa kuri email yawe umaze gusaba kwiga.

policy.title: Icyitonderwa (Important Note)
policy.subtext: (All tuition fees paid are strictly non-refundable.)
policy.details: Nyamuneka menya neza ko wiyemeje neza amasomo n'uburyo bwo kwiga wahisemo mbere yo kwishyura.

gallery.title: Umuryango Wacu mu Bikomeye
gallery.subtitle: Amafoto & Videwo by'Amahugurwa
gallery.description: Bona ishusho y'aho twigira imyitozo ngiro muri Usafi Barista Training Center. Aya mayungururwa yerekana ubwitange, kwibanda, n'ubucuti buri hagati y'abanyeshuri bacu n'abatoza bacu.

clip1.title: Ubuzima bwa buri munsi muri Usafi

clip3.title: Ikiganiro n'Umunyeshuri
clip3.desc: Ibitekerezo ku isomo yakunze kurusha ayandi.

cta.title: Irebere mu Bikomeye
cta.description: Gena igihe cyo gusura ikigo cyacu cya Kimironko kugira ngo wibonere aho twigira.

equipment.title: Ibikoresho Bikwiye ku Kazi
equipment.subtitle: Ibikoresho by'Imena ku Itangira ry'Ubucuruzi bwa Kawa
equipment.description: Gutangira ubucuruzi bwa café bisaba ibirenze ubushake—bisaba ibikoresho bikwiye. Izi nama ziragaragaza ibikoresho by'ibanze bikenewe kugira ngo akazi kihute, kabe k'ubuziranenge, kandi gahoraho, twaba utangiye café nini cyangwa akazu gatanga espresso.

espresso.title: Imashini ya Espresso
espresso.subtitle: Umutima w'ubucuruzi bwawe.
espresso.description: Hitamo imashini ishingiye ku ngano y'ibyo ukora (single-group cyangwa multi-group). Imashini yizewe itanga amapuresha n'ubushyuhe bihoraho kugira ngo ubone ikawa itunganye buri gihe.

grinder.title: Imashini Isya Ikawa
grinder.subtitle: Ifite akamaro nk'imashini nyirizina.
grinder.description: Imashini isya nziza ituma ikawa isywa mu buryo bumwe kugira ngo itange uburyohe nyabwo. Ikawa isywe nabi ituma uburyohe butaba bwiza kandi ikawa ikayangizwa.

tamper.title: Tamper
tamper.description: Ituma ikawa inanikwa neza mu gikoresho kugira ngo itange uburyohe bumwe. Calibrated tampers zirashishikarizwa kugira ngo akazi kabe kamwe.

pitcher.title: Milk Pitcher
pitcher.description: Ibikoresho bya Stainless steel bikenewe mu gutogosa amata. Gira ingano zitandukanye (350ml, 600ml) bijyanye n'ibyo abakiriya baka.

knock.title: Knock Box
knock.description: Ikoreshwa mu kujugunya ikawa imaze gukoreshwa mu buryo bw'isuku. Igomba kuba ikomeye kandi yoroheye kuyisukura.

scales.title: Iminzani (Digital Scales)
scales.description: Kugena neza birakenewe cyane. Ikoreshwa mu gupima ingano y'ikawa n'umuvuduko w'ibyo ukora.

cups.title: Ibikombe & Birahuri
cups.description: Ibikombe by'ibumba ku banywera aha. Demitasse kuri espresso. Ibikombe birinda ubushyuhe kandi bitangiza ibidukikije ku batwara ikawa.

storage.title: Ububiko
storage.description: Ibikoresho bifunga neza kugira ngo ikawa ishyizweho imiriro igume ari nshya kandi kure y'uburyuhe.

pos.title: Point of Sale (POS)
pos.description: Porogaramu y'imena mu gucunga komande, gukurikirana imigendekere y'ibicuruzwa, no kwakira ubwishyu.

kit.title: Ibikoresho by'Isuku
kit.description: Ibikoresho byagenewe isuku ya buri munsi y'imashini, group head, n'aho amata anyura.

agents.title: Ibinyabutabire by'Isuku
agents.description: Koresha gusa imiti y'isuku yemewe n'izindi mbaraga zirinda imashini yawe kwangirika.

gear.title: Ibikoresho by'Umutekano
gear.description: First aid kit igomba kuba iri hafi. Amashira (mats) arinda kunyerera inyuma ya bar.

pricing.title: Ibiciro & Aho Wabigura
pricing.description: Ibiciro biratandukanye bitewe n'ikirango, ubushobozi, n'uko imashini imeze. Dore amakuru y'ibanze mu gutegura ingengo y'imari yawe:

advice.title: Inama ku bwigura:
advice.description: Shaka ibikoresho byakoreshejwe ariko bimeze neza (refurbished) kugira ngo ucunge neza ingengo y y'imari yawe. Duha abanyeshuri bacu urutonde rw'aho bagura ibikoresho hizewe haba mu gihugu no hanze.

pricing.cta_sub: Yigire ku gutegura ubucuruzi, gushaka ibikoresho, n'isesengura ry'ibiciro mu isomo rya Coffee Shop Business.

blog.title: Usafi Insights
blog.subtitle: Aho ukura inama kuri Kawa, Amakuru y'Inganda, n'Inama z'Ubucuruzi
blog.description: Blog ya Usafi ni aho ubushake buhurira n'ubuhanga. Guma uzi amakuru agezweho mu isi ya kawa, bona inama z'ingirakamaro mu mwuga wawe, kandi bone imbaraga mu rugendo rwawe rw'ubushabitsi.

p1.title: Ibanga ryo Gutogosa Amata Itunganye (Micro-Foam)
p1.snippet: Kumenya uburyo bw'vortex ni ingenzi mu gukora amata yoroshye akoreshwa mu gushushanya (latte art).

p2.title: Inama ku Itangira ry'Ubucuruzi bwa Café
p2.snippet: Kuva ku gushaka aho gukorera kugeza ku kugena ibiciro, dore inkingi 5 z'intsinzi mu gufungura café.

p3.title: Amashimwe ku Cyiciro Gisoje Amasomo
p3.snippet: Twishimira umuhate n'ubwitange bw'abanyeshuri basoje mu cyiciro cya 12.

p4.title: Uburyo bwo Gutsinda Ikiganiro cya mbere cy'Akazi (Barista Interview)
p4.snippet: Kwigirira icyizere, isuku, n'ubumenyi bwa kawa. Dore icyo abakoresha bashaka koko.

newsletter.title: Ntugacikwe n'Amakuru!
newsletter.description: Iyandikishe mu rutonde rwacu rwa email kugira ngo uhabwe amakuru n'amahirwe y'akazi mu buryo butaziguye.

testimonials.title: Inkuru z'Intsinzi
testimonials.subtitle: Umva Ibyo Abanyeshuri bacu Bavuga
testimonials.description: Igipimo nyacyo cy'amahugurwa yacu ni intsinzi y'abanyeshuri bacu. Soma kandi urebe uburyo Usafi Barista Training Center yafashije guhindura vubushake mo umwuga ucuruzwa, bigafasha abanyeshuri kubona akazi mu mahoteli n'ama café akomeye cyangwa gufungura ubucuruzi bwabo.

featured.title: Kuva ku Munyeshuri kugeza kuri Nyir'ubucuruzi: Inkuru ya Alex
featured.description: Alex asangira natwe uburyo amasomo ya Coffee Shop Business yamuhaye uburyo bufatika n'imiyoboro y'abagemuzi bakenewe kugira ngo afungure café ye nyuma y'amezi atandatu gusa asoje amasomo.

grace.text: "Mbere ya Usafi, nta kintu na kimwe nari nzi kuri coffee science. Nyuma y'amasomo ya Onsite, nizeye ubumenyi bwanjye maze nsaba kwimenyereza akazi. Usafi yanyohereje muri hoteli bafatanya, maze bampira akazi k'igihe cyose nyuma y'amezi abiri. Gushyigikirwa mu mwuga byari ingirakamaro cyane."
grace.name: Grace Mutesi

kevin.text: "Kwitaho ku bintu bito muri espresso extraction no gutogosa amata byari bitangaje. Ubu nshobora gukora buri gihe ikawa y'ubuziranenge buhambaye, kandi abakiriya banjye barabibona. Ubumenyi bwa Latte Art bwonyine bunyubakira icyizere imbere y'abandi bakora aka kazi."
kevin.name: Kevin Mugisha

patience.text: "Nasoreje amasomo ya E-Learning mugihe nakoraga akazi ka nijoro. Videwo z'amasomo n'impapuro za PDF byari byiza cyane mu kwiga mbinyujije mu kwigisha. Ndashishikariza buri wese ushaka kwiga ariko akagira gahunda nyinshi guhitamo Usafi kuko bitabangamira ubuziranenge bw'ibyo wiga."
patience.name: Patience Uwamahoro

thankyou.title: Ubusabe Bwakiriwe!
thankyou.description: Urakoze gusaba kwiga muri Usafi Barista Training Center. Tukoherereje email ikubiyemo amakuru yo kwishyura n'intambwe zikurikira.

newsletter.title: Iyandikishe ku Makuru yacu
newsletter.subtitle: Menya amakuru agezweho, ibigezweho, n'amahirwe mashya.

search.type_to_begin: Andika byibura inyuguti 2 kugira ngo ushake
